bike.description: Kinesis 7005 triple-butted aluminum main tubes, carbon fiber monostay, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, sloping radius top tube, over-sized seat tube, PressFit30 BB shell, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Rock Shox Reba RLT29, Dual Air with Motion Control damping, external rebound & low-speed compression-to-"lock", 32mm stanchions, tapered alloy steerer, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
Sun/Ringle Black Flag Comp 29"w/ StanJAMIS_SINGLEQUOTEs NoTubes technology, 24mm width, cartridge bearing hubs w/ Wheelsmith double butted spokes
SRAM X9 mid cage rear and X7 34.9mm dual pull front
Ritchey Mountain Comp flat bar, 31.8 x 10JAMIS_DEGREE x 660mm
Ritchey Comp 2 bolt OS, 31.6 x 400mm, with alloy clamp and cromo seatpin
